name: Extra Small Time Bonus
description: Adds a small amount of time to your clock. Most common card in the deck. Good for steady progress.

name: Small Time Bonus
description: Adds a decent amount of time to your clock. A reliable mid-value card for building your time bank.

name: Medium Time Bonus
description: Adds a substantial amount of time to your clock. Less common but worth holding onto for the right moment.

name: Large Time Bonus
description: Adds a large amount of time to your clock. Rare and valuable - use strategically for maximum impact.

name: Extra Large Time Bonus
description: Adds the maximum time bonus to your clock. The rarest and most valuable card. Save for critical moments or difficult challenges.

name: Randomize
description: When played in response to any question, the Randomize powerup forces the seekers to randomly select a different question from the same category using a random number generator or dice.

name: Veto
description: Cancels or rejects the current question or challenge. Powerful defensive card to skip unfavorable situations.

name: Duplicate
description: Creates a copy of another card in your hand. Choose wisely to duplicate your best time bonus or save a useful action card.

name: Discard 1 Draw 2
description: Discard one card from your hand and draw two new cards. Good for refreshing weak cards and expanding options.

name: Discard 2 Draw 3
description: Discard two cards from your hand and draw three new cards. Powerful card cycling for when you need fresh options quickly.

name: Curse of The Zoologist
description: Force seekers to photograph wildlife in same category
curse_text: Take a photo of a wild fish, bird, mammal, reptile, amphibian or bug. The seeker(s) must take a picture of a wild animal in the same category before asking another question.

name: Curse Of The Unguided Tourist
description: Send seekers an unzoomed Street View image to find
curse_text: Send the seeker(s) an unzoomed google Street View image from a street within 500ft (152m) of where they are now. The shot has to be parallel to the horizon and include at least one human-built structure other than a road. Without using the internet for research, they must find what you sent them in real life before they can use transportation or ask another question. They must send a picture to the hiders for verification.

name: Curse Of The Endless Tumble
description: Seekers must roll die 100ft for 5 or 6

casting_cost.die_roll: Roll a die. If its 5 or 6 this card has no effect.

curse_text: Seekers Must roll a die at least 100ft (30m) and have it land on a 5 or a 6 before they can ask another question. The die must roll the full distance, unaided, using only the momentum from the initial throw and gravity to travel the 100ft (30m). If the seekers accidentally hit someone with a die you are awarded a [S10, M20, L30] minute bonus.

name: Curse Of The Hidden Hangman
description: Seekers must be hiders in hangman game
curse_text: Before asking another question or boarding another form of transportation, seeker(s) must be the hider(s) in game of hangman.

name: Curse Of The Overflowing Chalice
description: Draw additional card for next 3 questions
curse_text: For the next three questions, you may draw (not keep) an additional card when drawing from the hider deck.

name: Curse Of The Mediocre Travel Agent
description: Send seekers on vacation to specific location
curse_text: Choose any publicly-accessible place within [S0.25, M0.25, L0.50]mi [S0.40, M0.40, L0.80]km of the seeker(s) current location. They cannot currently be on transit. They must go there, and spend at least [S5, M5, L10] minutes there, before asking another question. They must send you at least three photos of them enjoying their vacation, and procure an object to bring you as souvenir. If this souvenir is lost before they can get to you, you are awarded an extra [S30, M45, L60] minutes.

name: Curse Of The Luxury Car
description: Seekers must find more expensive car
curse_text: Take a photo of a car. The seekers must take a photo of a more expensive car before asking another question.

name: Curse Of The U-Turn
description: Seekers disembark at next station

casting_cost.location: Seekers must be heading the wrong way. (Their next station is further from you then they are.)

curse_text: Seeker(s) must disembark their current mode of transportation at the next station (as long as that station is served by another form of transit in the next [S0.5, M0.5, L1] hours).

name: Curse Of The Bridge Troll
description: Seekers must ask next question from under bridge

casting_cost.location: Seekers Must be at least [S1, M5, L30]mi [S0.3, M1.5, L9.1]km from you

curse_text: The seekers must ask their next question from under a bridge.

name: Curse Of Water Weight
description: Seekers must carry 2 liters liquid per seeker

casting_cost.location: Seekers must be within 1,000ft (300 meters) of a body of water

curse_text: Seeker(s) must acquire and carry at least 2 liters of liquid per seeker for the rest of your run. They cannot ask another question until they have acquired the liquid. The water may be distributed between seekers as they see fit. If the liquid is lost or abandoned at any point the hider is awarded a [S30, M30, L60] minute bonus.

name: Curse Of The Jammed Door
description: Seekers roll dice to enter doorways
curse_text: For the next [S0.5, M1, L3] hours, whenever the seeker(s) want to pass through a doorway into a building, business, train, or other vehicle they must first roll 2 dice. If they do not roll a 7 or higher they cannot enter that space (including through other doorways). Any given doorway can be reattempted after [S5, M10, L15] minutes.

name: Curse Of The Cairn
description: Build rock tower, seekers must match height
curse_text: You have one attempt to stack as many rocks on top of each other as you can in a freestanding tower. Each rock may only touch one other rock. Once you have added a rock to the tower it may not be removed. Before adding another rock, the tower must stand for at least 5 seconds. If at any point any rock other then the base rock touches the ground, your tower has fallen. Once your tower falls tell the seekers how many rocks high your tower was when it last stood for five seconds. The seekers must then construct a rock tower of the same number of rocks, under the same parameters before asking another question. If their tower falls they must restart. The rocks must be found in nature and both teams must disperse the rocks after building.

name: Curse Of The Urban Explorer
description: Seekers cannot ask questions on transit or in train stations
curse_text: For the rest of the run seekers cannot ask questions when they are on transit or in a train station.

name: Curse Of The Impressionable Consumer
description: Seekers must visit advertised location or buy advertised product

casting_cost.location: The seekers next question is free

curse_text: Seekers must enter and gain admission (if applicable) to a location or buy a product that they saw an advertisement for before asking another question. This advertisement must be found out in the world and must be at least 100ft (30m) from the product or location itself.

name: Curse Of The Egg Partner
description: Seekers adopt egg as team member
curse_text: Seeker(s) must acquire an egg before asking another question. This egg is now treated as an official team member of the seekers. If any team members are abandoned or killed (defined as crack in the eggs case) before the end of your run you are awarded an extra [S30, M45, L60] minutes. This curse cannot be played during the endgame.

name: Curse Of The Distant Cuisine
description: Seekers must visit restaurant serving food from distant country

casting_cost.location: You must be at the restaurant

curse_text: Find a restaurant within your zone that explicitly serves food from a specific foreign country. The seekers must visit a restaurant serving food from a country that is equal or greater distance away before asking another question. Food does not need to be purchased or consumed, only visiting the restaurant is required.

name: Curse Of The Right Turn
description: Seekers can only turn right at intersections
curse_text: For the next [S20, M40, L60] minutes the seekers can only turn right at any street intersection. If at any point they find themselves in dead end where they cannot continue forward or turn right for another 1,000ft (304m) they must do a full 180. A right turn is defined as a road at any angle that veers to the right of the seekers.

name: Curse Of The Labyrinth
description: Draw maze for seekers to solve
curse_text: Spend up to [S10, M20, L30] minutes drawing a solvable maze and send a photo of it to the seekers. You cannot use the internet to research maze designs. The seekers must solve the maze before asking another question.

name: Curse Of The Bird Guide
description: Film bird, seekers must match duration
curse_text: You have one chance to film a bird for as long as possible. Up to [S5, M10, L15] minutes straight, if at any point the bird leaves the frame your timer is stopped. The seekers must then film a bird for the same amount of time or longer.

name: Curse Of Spotty Memory
description: Random question category disabled at all times
curse_text: For the rest of the run, one random category of questions will be disabled at all times. After this curse is played seeker(s) must roll a die to determine the category of questions to be disabled. The category remains disabled until the next question is asked at which point a die is rolled again to choose a category. The same category can be disabled multiple times in a row.

name: Curse Of The Lemon Phylactery
description: Seekers must affix lemons to themselves
curse_text: Before asking another question the seeker(s) must each find a lemon and affix it to their outermost layer of their clothes or skin. If at any point one of these lemons is no longer touching a seeker you are awarded [S30, M45, L60] minutes. This curse cannot be played during the endgame.

name: Curse Of The Drained Brain
description: Ban three questions in different categories
curse_text: Choose three questions in different categories. The seekers cannot ask those questions for the rest of the run.

name: Curse Of The Ransom Note
description: Next question must be composed of cut-out letters

casting_cost.die_roll: Spell out 'Ransom Note' as a ransom note (without using this card)

curse_text: The next question that the seekers ask must be composed of words and letters cut out of any printed material. The question must be coherent and include at least 5 words.

name: Curse Of The Gambler's Feet
description: Seekers roll die before each step

casting_cost.die_roll: Roll a die. If it's an even number this curse has no effect.

curse_text: For the next [S20, M40, L60] minutes seekers must roll a die before they take any steps in any direction, they may take that many steps before rolling again.
